idea:
Wealthtrust is a wealth management platform to help users choose the best investment options with the help of unbiased advisory. We are going after a big market (20M investors with AUM $150B in Mutual Funds) currently underserved due to lack of innovation. 


As of today this domain is mostly dominated by agents  where they earn commissions from the mutual fund companies. This leads to biased and non-scientific advisory. The recent technology products which have managed to bring a fraction of investments online, continue to execute the same model. This model scrapes 1.5% of the invested AUM 'annually' as fees to agents & reduces the investment returns of individuals by upto 50% over life. Wealthtrust is providing its users the ability to earn this additional return on their current portfolio and future investments.


Our product offering is being designed to disrupt and induce a user behavior change in mutual fund investments similar to what Zerodha brought to stock investments. Our approach gives us both a differentiation and edge over all existing platform. Our users love Wealthtrust which is evident from the significant organic growth and notable stickiness on the platform.


Wealthtrust offerings: 

- Unbiased advisory services at affordable rates

- Paperless account opening and transactions

- Easy migration and management of current MF portfolio 

- One click switch to 'Direct Investment Plan' to earn 1.5% additional returns per year. 

- Easy park of saving account funds to liquid funds to earn more returns on that money.
name: EVOLUSOLVE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Company will provide mortgage guarantee products (including through structured credit arrangements) that provide a) residential mortgage credit default protection to the various residential mortgage lenders against default by borrowers, b) residential mortgage credit default protection to the various residential mortgage lenders and borrowers against default by developers, c) charge fee as mortgage guarantor d) Any other business allowed within RBI guidelines and license conditions for Mortgage Insurance and d) to have strategic alliances with any company/companies for the same
name: SANCHI MORTGAGE ASSURANCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The Whiz Lab is India's fastest growing STEM Education start up founded by a team of ex-Googlers, engineers and patent holders. 

We enable kids to explore the world of STEM & STEAM • The Whiz Lab provides the best learning experience to kids via hands on project based learning •  


The Whiz Lab was awarded the "Best STEM EDUCATION START UP INDIA 2019" by All India Council of Robotics & Automation(AICRA).


Our mission is to inspire, train and empower future global scientists, technologists, and engineers. We make children aware that science is in their houses. One does not need store bought games to explore concepts of science & technology.


We provide after school STEM workshops, robotics curriculum, science camps and in-school STEM programs.

We cater to students from Jr. KG to Grade 8. 


Our year long STEM programs for private, public & pre-schools is designed to provide a structured environment with experiential learning. Our gradewise curriculum develops technical skills in STEM alongside other skills that students need to succeed such as independence, collaboration, questioning, problem solving, and critical thinking.

All the working materials are provided in the class and the kids take their project home after every session. A once a week program where kids learn by making a new project in every class
name: WHIZ STEAM EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED
